医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究合作有助于促进 NBA G 联赛球员的健康并减少受伤美国国家篮球协会 (NBA)、国家篮球运动员协会 (NBPA) 和下一代篮球运动员联盟 (NBGPU) 与 GE HealthCare 和 MedStar Health 合作今天宣布完成 NBA 纵向试点研究的数据收集阶段G联赛球员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Research-collaboration-could-help-promote-health-and-reduce-injuries-in-NBA-G-League-players.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Research-collaboration-could-help-promote-health-and-reduce-injuries-in-NBA-G-League-players.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd048875-65ad-4f4e-a83e-75782b6ca70b Mon, 13 May 2024 15:42:01 -0400 Research collaboration could help promote health and reduce injuries in NBA G League players
研究探讨了消防员对癌症风险和饮食习惯的认识与普通人群相比，消防员患多种癌症（例如消化道癌和呼吸道癌）的风险过高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Research-explores-firefighters-awareness-of-cancer-risk-and-dietary-practices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Research-explores-firefighters-awareness-of-cancer-risk-and-dietary-practices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d4f1827-dbc6-48ba-a32d-025f45453c5a Mon, 13 May 2024 15:37:00 -0400 Research explores firefighters' awareness of cancer risk and dietary practices
研究人员发现肠道微生物如何影响小鼠的社会行为对于患有自闭症的人来说，便秘、腹泻和腹痛往往伴随着社交斗争和重复行为，这些都是造成这种情况的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Researchers-discover-how-gut-microbes-influence-social-behavior-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Researchers-discover-how-gut-microbes-influence-social-behavior-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b824702b-fddb-45c1-897a-bbf2da3a4204 Mon, 13 May 2024 15:33:51 -0400 Researchers discover how gut microbes influence social behavior in mice
研究表明，邮寄堕胎药既安全又方便根据加州大学旧金山分校的最新研究，通过邮寄方式分发堕胎药以及要求患者亲自从诊所或医生办公室领取堕胎药是可行的，而最高法院正在考虑是否禁止这种做法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Mail-delivery-of-abortion-pills-is-safe-and-convenient-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Mail-delivery-of-abortion-pills-is-safe-and-convenient-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65993d11-1696-4fba-bc22-c18f60723f7c Mon, 13 May 2024 15:26:55 -0400 Mail delivery of abortion pills is safe and convenient, study shows
以植物为基础的饮食可以减少前列腺癌男性疾病进展的机会加州大学旧金山分校的最新研究表明，患有前列腺癌的男性可以通过多吃水果、蔬菜、坚果和橄榄油来显着降低病情恶化的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Plant-based-diets-could-reduce-the-chances-of-disease-progression-in-men-with-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Plant-based-diets-could-reduce-the-chances-of-disease-progression-in-men-with-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4293ed71-65c3-4a77-85ed-34eaf13b6659 Mon, 13 May 2024 15:13:47 -0400 Plant-based diets could reduce the chances of disease progression in men with prostate cancer
植物病毒衍生的治疗显示出对抗转移性癌症的希望加州大学圣地亚哥分校的一项新研究表明，由植物病毒制成的实验性治疗方法可有效预防小鼠体内多种转移性癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Plant-virus-driven-treatment-shows-promise-against-metastatic-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Plant-virus-driven-treatment-shows-promise-against-metastatic-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce1f6839-d685-4b4e-8784-f24f7972461c Mon, 13 May 2024 15:01:38 -0400 Plant virus-derived treatment shows promise against metastatic cancers
Aficamten有望增强肥厚型心肌病患者的运动能力尽管死亡率和住院率有所改善，但肥厚型心肌病 (HCM) 患者的生活质量可能会因劳力性呼吸困难和运动能力下降等限制性症状而受到影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Aficamten-shows-promise-in-enhancing-exercise-capacity-in-病人-with-hypertropic-cardiomyopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Aficamten-shows-promise-in-enhancing-exercise-capacity-in-病人-with-hypertropic-cardiomyopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7adeb580-83c4-4c9d-8b8c-338658d53afc Mon, 13 May 2024 14:54:25 -0400 Aficamten shows promise in enhancing exercise capacity in patients with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy
研究揭示了巨噬细胞在癌症复发中的作用新加坡国立大学 (NUS) 新加坡癌症科学研究所的研究人员在了解弥漫性大 B 细胞淋巴瘤 (DLBCL) 癌症化疗后的复发方面取得了突破性进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Research-unlocks-the-role-of-macrophages-in-cancer-relapse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Research-unlocks-the-role-of-macrophages-in-cancer-relapse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e763b78-de9f-4f4b-825c-40f3123cf330 Mon, 13 May 2024 14:49:05 -0400 Research unlocks the role of macrophages in cancer relapse
中国开创性的监管措施被证明可以有效减少儿童久坐行为最新研究表明，解决中国儿童久坐行为的开创性措施已被证明是有效的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Pioneering-regulatory-measures-in-china-prove- effective-in-reducing-childrens-sedentary-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Pioneering-regulatory-measures-in-china-prove- effective-in-reducing-childrens-sedentary-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c8954e4-8420-42ed-9bbd-d5158d157c90 Mon, 13 May 2024 14:19:00 -0400 Pioneering regulatory measures in China prove effective in reducing children's sedentary behavior
研究显示非法芬太尼缉获量急剧增加一项新的分析显示，2017 年至 2023 年间，美国执法部门缉获的非法芬太尼数量增长了 1,700% 以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Study-reveals-sharp-surge-in-illicit-fentanyl-seizures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Study-reveals-sharp-surge-in-illicit-fentanyl-seizures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5427f383-a3d5-4fb6-a318-459e834d9fec Mon, 13 May 2024 14:04:09 -0400 Study reveals sharp surge in illicit fentanyl seizures
